www/html/online/trend_plots/runsummary/tutorials/JetEvent.cxx

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 // A JetEvent emulates 2 detectors A and B producing each
00002 // a TClonesArray of Hit objects.
00003 // A TClonesArray  of Track objects is built with Hits objects
00004 // of detectors A and B. Eack Track object has a TRefArray of hits.
00005 // A TClonesArray of Jets is made with a subset of the Track objects
00006 // also stored in a TRefArray.
00007 // see $ROOTSYS/tutorials/jets.C for an example creating a Tree
00008 // with JetEvents.
00009       
00010 #include "TRandom.h"   
00011 #include "JetEvent.h"
00012 
00013 ClassImp(Jet)
00014 ClassImp(Track)
00015 ClassImp(Hit)
00016 ClassImp(JetEvent)
00017 
00018 TClonesArray *JetEvent::fgJets   = 0;
00019 TClonesArray *JetEvent::fgTracks = 0;
00020 TClonesArray *JetEvent::fgHitsA  = 0;
00021 TClonesArray *JetEvent::fgHitsB  = 0;
00022 
00023 //______________________________________________________________________________
00024 JetEvent::JetEvent()
00025 {
00026    // Create a JetEvent object.
00027    // When the constructor is invoked for the first time, the class static
00028    // variables fgxxx are 0 and the TClonesArray fgxxx are created.
00029 
00030    if (!fgTracks) fgTracks = new TClonesArray("Track", 100);
00031    if (!fgJets)   fgJets   = new TClonesArray("Jet", 10);
00032    if (!fgHitsA)  fgHitsA  = new TClonesArray("Hit", 10000);
00033    if (!fgHitsB)  fgHitsB  = new TClonesArray("Hit", 1000);
00034    fJets   = fgJets;
00035    fTracks = fgTracks;
00036    fHitsA  = fgHitsA;
00037    fHitsB  = fgHitsB;
00038 }
00039 
00040 //______________________________________________________________________________
00041 JetEvent::~JetEvent()
00042 {
00043    Reset();
00044 }
00045 
00046 //______________________________________________________________________________
00047 void JetEvent::Build(Int_t jetm, Int_t trackm, Int_t hitam, Int_t hitbm) {
00048    //Build one event
00049    
00050    //Save current Object count
00051    Int_t ObjectNumber = TProcessID::GetObjectCount();
00052    Clear();
00053 
00054    Hit *hit;
00055    Track *track;
00056    Jet *jet;
00057    fNjet   = fNtrack = fNhitA  = fNhitB  = 0;
00058    
00059    fVertex.SetXYZ(gRandom->Gaus(0,0.1),
00060                   gRandom->Gaus(0,0.2),
00061                   gRandom->Gaus(0,10));
00062       
00063    Int_t njets = (Int_t)gRandom->Gaus(jetm,1); if (njets < 1) njets = 1;
00064    for (Int_t j=0;j<njets;j++) {
00065       jet = AddJet();
00066       jet->fPt = gRandom->Gaus(0,10);
00067       jet->fPhi = 2*TMath::Pi()*gRandom->Rndm();
00068       Int_t ntracks = (Int_t)gRandom->Gaus(trackm,3); if (ntracks < 1) ntracks = 1;
00069       for (Int_t t=0;t<ntracks;t++) {
00070          track = AddTrack();
00071          track->fPx = gRandom->Gaus(0,1);
00072          track->fPy = gRandom->Gaus(0,1);
00073          track->fPz = gRandom->Gaus(0,5);
00074          jet->fTracks.Add(track);
00075          Int_t nhitsA = (Int_t)gRandom->Gaus(hitam,5);
00076          for (Int_t ha=0;ha<nhitsA;ha++) {
00077             hit = AddHitA();
00078             hit->fX = 10000*j + 100*t +ha;
00079             hit->fY = 10000*j + 100*t +ha+0.1;
00080             hit->fZ = 10000*j + 100*t +ha+0.2;
00081             track->fHits.Add(hit);
00082          }
00083          Int_t nhitsB = (Int_t)gRandom->Gaus(hitbm,2);
00084          for (Int_t hb=0;hb<nhitsB;hb++) {
00085             hit = AddHitB();
00086             hit->fX = 20000*j + 100*t +hb+0.3;
00087             hit->fY = 20000*j + 100*t +hb+0.4;
00088             hit->fZ = 20000*j + 100*t +hb+0.5;
00089             track->fHits.Add(hit);
00090          }
00091          track->fNhit = nhitsA + nhitsB;
00092       }
00093    }         
00094   //Restore Object count 
00095   //To save space in the table keeping track of all referenced objects
00096   //we assume that our events do not address each other. We reset the 
00097   //object count to what it was at the beginning of the event.
00098   TProcessID::SetObjectCount(ObjectNumber);
00099 }
00100 
00101 
00102 //______________________________________________________________________________
00103 Jet *JetEvent::AddJet()
00104 {
00105    // Add a new Jet to the list of tracks for this event.
00106 
00107    TClonesArray &jets = *fJets;
00108    Jet *jet = new(jets[fNjet++]) Jet();
00109    return jet;
00110 }
00111 
00112 
00113 //______________________________________________________________________________
00114 Track *JetEvent::AddTrack()
00115 {
00116    // Add a new track to the list of tracks for this event.
00117 
00118    TClonesArray &tracks = *fTracks;
00119    Track *track = new(tracks[fNtrack++]) Track();
00120    return track;
00121 }
00122 
00123 
00124 //______________________________________________________________________________
00125 Hit *JetEvent::AddHitA()
00126 {
00127    // Add a new hit to the list of hits in detector A
00128 
00129    TClonesArray &hitsA = *fHitsA;
00130    Hit *hit = new(hitsA[fNhitA++]) Hit();
00131    return hit;
00132 }
00133 
00134 //______________________________________________________________________________
00135 Hit *JetEvent::AddHitB()
00136 {
00137    // Add a new hit to the list of hits in detector B
00138 
00139    TClonesArray &hitsB = *fHitsB;
00140    Hit *hit = new(hitsB[fNhitB++]) Hit();
00141    return hit;
00142 }
00143 
00144 //______________________________________________________________________________
00145 void JetEvent::Clear(Option_t *option)
00146 {
00147    fJets->Clear(option);
00148    fTracks->Clear(option);
00149    fHitsA->Clear(option);
00150    fHitsB->Clear(option);
00151 }
00152 
00153 //______________________________________________________________________________
00154 void JetEvent::Reset(Option_t *)
00155 {
00156 // Static function to reset all static objects for this event
00157 
00158    delete fgJets;   fgJets = 0;
00159    delete fgTracks; fgTracks = 0;
00160    delete fgHitsA;  fgHitsA = 0;
00161    delete fgHitsB;  fgHitsB = 0;
00162 }
